mapper.sql: id, user_id, country, state, city, area, street, detail, zip_code, telephone, flag, datetime, by_who, deleted
mapper.select:
select
from address where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0

select
from address where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into address (user_id, country, state, city, area, street, detail, zip_code, telephone, flag, datetime, by_who, deleted ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{country,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{city,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{area,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{street,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{byWho,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} )

mapper.update: update address set deleted = 1 where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleted = 0

user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
country = #{country,jdbcType=BIGINT},
